about_the_game: Return to the beautiful Shio Islands with this soundtrack that fuses New Age music with traditional Japanese music to make a truly delightful experience. Feel yourself sailing through these gorgeous seas and visiting these picturesque beaches while listening to this truly relaxing soundtrack!

Feel yourself sailing through these gorgeous seas and visiting these picturesque beaches while listening to this truly relaxing soundtrack!
